org.modelio.api.module.context.configuration

Interface IModuleUserConfiguration


  • public interface IModuleUserConfiguration
    This interface describe the API of module configuration to use for UI. It allows to set a new config parameter validator.

    Available only on IModule.

      • setParameterValidator

                           IConfigParamValidator validator)

      • getParameterValue

        java.lang.String getParameterValue(java.lang.String key)
        Get the value of the parameter identified by the given key.

        Returns null if the key does not exist

        Parameters:
        key - Key of the parameter
        Returns:
        The value of the key parameter (or null)

      • getParameters

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters()
        Get all parameter values.
        Returns:
        A map representing the parameter name as key and the parameter value as value.

      • setParameterValue

        boolean setParameterValue(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String value)
        Set the value of a parameter.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the parameter
        value - Value to define on the parameter
        Returns:
        true if the parameter is only locally defined.

      • updateFrom

        void updateFrom(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
        Update the mdac parameters with the given ones.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The new module parameter values.

      • getModuleResourcesPath

        java.nio.file.Path getModuleResourcesPath()
        Get the path where the files packaged with the module were deployed. It allows the module to access its resource files.
        Returns:
        the module resources path.

      • getDocpath

        java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> getDocpath()
        Returns the documentation path.
        Returns:
        the documentation path.

      • getParameterValidator

        IConfigParamValidator getParameterValidator(java.lang.String paramName)

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked(java.lang.String key)
        Get the lock status of the parameter identified by the given key.

        A parameter is locked when defined by a Modelio server.

        Parameters:
        key - Key of the parameter
        Returns:
        Whether or not the given parameter is locked.

      • getStylePath

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.nio.file.Path> getStylePath()
        Returns the style path.
        Returns:
        the style path.

      • addListener

        void addListener(IModuleConfigurationListener l)
        Add a IModuleConfigurationListener listener. A IModuleConfigurationListener is called whenever a module parameter value changes.
        Parameters:
        l - The listener to add
        Since:
        4.1

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(IModuleConfigurationListener l)
        Remove a previously added listener
        Parameters:
        l - The listener to remove
        Since:
        4.1
